A lot of twists and deaths. I feel like: Do I really have to give the 1 star for RT to count my vote?  Whatever.  I have been using RT for a decade\, but this is my first review.  I had to come out and let people know the truth about this movie.  What did you do to Luke?  Luke...my eternally optimistic hero has given up on everything.  This not the Luke you're looking for *waves fingers*.  I never thought I'd miss the prequels.  Never.
